definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: After going only a mile or so, they realized they had forgotten the milking stools.
sentences.chinese: 走了大約一英里，他們發現擠奶用的凳子忘記拿了。

sentences.english: A thin, white-haired man was sitting on a wooden seat.
sentences.chinese: 一個瘦削而頭髮全白的人正坐在一個木頭凳子上。

sentences.english: Shortly after, I heard someone moving a bamboo stool.
sentences.chinese: 過了一會，又聽見有人在挪動那竹凳子。

sentences.english: But as soon as you cut off one leg of the stool, prepare to meet the floor.
sentences.chinese: 但只要您砍掉凳子的一條腿，那就準備掉在地上吧。

sentences.english: It's like kicking the legs out from under a stool.
sentences.chinese: 這就像踢掉凳子下面的凳腿。

sentences.english: She pulled the stool over on herself.
Best, of course, is a stool where all three legs are equal.
sentences.chinese: 當然，最好的情況是凳子的全部三條腿是一樣長的。

sentences.english: You walked about my seat, playing with blue plums.
sentences.chinese: 你在我凳子邊上轉悠，和藍梅一塊玩兒。

sentences.english: In the middle of the room was the grand piano with two round stools.
sentences.chinese: 在房間的中央中是有二個回合凳子的大鋼琴。

sentences.english: Krishna carried on His head the shoes and wooden stool of His father Nanda.
sentences.chinese: 克里希納把父親南達的鞋子和木製的凳子舉到了頭上。

sentences.english: Stools and counters are lined with chrome, the lighting is viscid.
sentences.chinese: 鍍鉻的凳子和吧檯，慵懶的燈光。

sentences.english: Think of health care reform as being like a three-legged stool.
sentences.chinese: 你可以將醫療改革比作一個三條腿的凳子。

sentences.english: Someone pushed a stool at me and I sat down.
sentences.chinese: 有人推一個凳子過來，讓我坐下。

sentences.english: Its behind and pencils are on the desk their schoolbags are on chairs.
sentences.chinese: 牀後桌上放着鉛筆，書包放在凳子上。

sentences.english: He hoisted himself onto a high stool .
sentences.chinese: 他擡身坐上了一張高凳子。

sentences.english: And the black stool sat there reminding us of the impulsive purchase.
sentences.chinese: 那個黑凳子就站在那裏使我們想起那次的衝動購物。

definition: sofa (loanword)/CL:條|条[tiao2],張|张[zhang1]/(Internet slang) the first reply or replier to a forum post
small side table/coffee table/teapoy (ornamental tripod with caddies for tea)
